mapper.sql: id, name, teacher_name, start_time, type, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: select ci.* from course_info ci join course_class cc on ci.id = cc.course_id where cc.class_id = #{classId} and ci.is_deleted = 0 and cc.is_deleted = 0 union select ci.*from course_info ci join course_selected cs on ci.id = cs.course_id where cs.student_id = #{studentId} and ci.is_deleted = 0 and cs.is_deleted = 0;
